KitKat::

She looked at the two bots converse.  She nodded to Starstorm.
 "Hello. I am KitKat. Newly joined to the ranks."
She noticed the femme bot look at her with a touch of distaste. She 
didn't care. She wasn't here to find a mate. She was out to fight 
for the faction she was now apart of.  She didn't care if this femme 
didn't like her.  She only cared that this bot would show her the 
respect she deserved.  She had killed many bots in her time. And 
having one less bot on the planet didn't bother her.  Even if it was 
one of her own.  For now, she would watch and learn about this new 
group. Besides, she didn't think this bot mattered much in the 
leading ranks. She was only concerned with how Hydrus saw her. She 
wanted to lead. Not play games with bots who had soft sparks. She 
turned and noticed another bot looking at her with google optics.  
She shook her head. What has happened to the predacon empire since 
her last battle?  She felt her spark fall slightly. then her spark 
lifted. It occured to her that it would not be hard to gain power in 
the ranks if the others were all that softed sparked. 
She put her hand on her hip and swished her wolf tail. She looked up 
at Perceptor,
"Perhaps if it's not to much trouble, I would like to see the prints 
for this base. If I am to be effective here, I must first now my own 
ground. A wolf knows thier own backyard better than anyone. If ths 
is to be my new base of operations, I would like to be familiar with 
the layout of my new home."




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor/Starstorm:
> 
> "What is he watcing of that femme?, I'm most beauty"thought 
> Starstorm, and said "Who's that femme, Preceptor? Your Girlfriend 
> perhaps?"
> 
> Perceptor Growled, he alway had been heated the idea to have 
females 
> in Decepticons ranks, they weren't usefull and just gave troubles.
> 
> "Where you go, Starstorm?"replied the male
> 
> "I'm leading this guest to Hydras" replied the femme
> 
> "TRhen we have to wait"replied Perceptor"It seems that Hydras is 
> busy... But I guess that as soon as he ends with he will receive 
us "
>
